content: Crater seems to have been down over the last ~12 hours. I'm still not really sure why, but it seems like there was heavy i/o on the rust-bots server, so much so that we ran up against the 300 IOPS limit for the last 11 hours. I changed the disk type on the instance from gp2 to gp3 to bump the iops "for free" and that has cleared the backlog seemingly, so we seem to be back up now.
My crater run had ~25k regressions, so that might have been related
@simulacrum gp3 definitely seems like the right answer.
